title: Stattstrand and Pasta
excerpt: Well, today has been pretty uneventful. I haven’t gone anywhere or anything. I did meet Orion’s parents though. They’re out here to visit Orion and they flew in yesterday. Today he was showing them the university and Hermann-Ehlers-Haus, so I met them when they were here are Hermann-Ehlers-Haus. I read quite a bit of my … more →
